jodd.mail

Class MailServer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.MailServer.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    MailServer<MailSessionImpl extends jodd.mail.MailSession>

    public static class MailServer.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create implementing instances of MailServer.
    See Also:
    ImapServer, ImapSslServer, Pop3Server, Pop3SslServer, SmtpServer, SmtpSslServer
